title: The Adventurous Week of Ivan Jones: The Organizer Hero
summary: Ivan Jones, a 22-year-old with a knack for organizing and advising, discovers his superpowers over the course of a week, using them to unravel a city-wide mystery and ultimately becoming a hero.
summaryGerman: Ivan Jones, ein 22-Jähriger mit einer Begabung für Organisation und Beratung, entdeckt im Laufe einer Woche seine Superkräfte, nutzt sie, um ein stadtweites Rätsel zu lösen, und wird schließlich ein Held.
summaryDutch: Ivan Jones, een 22-jarige met een talent voor organiseren en adviseren, ontdekt zijn superkrachten gedurende een week, gebruikt ze om een stadsbreed mysterie op te lossen en wordt uiteindelijk een held.
summaryFrench: Ivan Jones, un jeune de 22 ans doué pour l'organisation et le conseil, découvre ses super pouvoirs au cours d'une semaine, les utilise pour élucider un mystère à l'échelle de la ville et devient finalement un héros.

story.text: Ivan, while decluttering his attic, stumbles upon an ancient artifact that grants him the power to see the hidden potential in people and objects.
Excited and energetic, Ivan starts small - he helps his neighbors organize their lives, which curiously solves many of their long-standing issues.
Ivan is approached by a mysterious figure who warns him of his power's origins and the responsibility it carries.
Troubled yet curious, Ivan tries to learn more about his powers and realizes he can influence events recently past, leading him to avert a small accident.
Emboldened by his successes, Ivan uses his powers more openly, inadvertently attracting the attention of a secretive villainous group.
A dramatic confrontation ensues, during which Ivan uses his organizing skills and new powers to trap the villains, just as the police arrive.
Ivan, celebrated as a hero, reflects on his new role and vows to use his powers for the greater good, establishing a peaceful life rhythm.

ending: And so, Ivan Jones became not just a hero, but a symbol of order in the face of chaos, inspiring countless others.
moral: Even ordinary skills, when combined with a touch of destiny, can lead to extraordinary deeds.
